title: Flashscore Scraper
description: The results of your favourite leagues, teams or players are at your fingertips. Get all match results including the most important statistics from 30+ sports such as ⚽️ Soccer, 🎾 Tennis, 🏀 Basketball, 🏒 Hockey, 🏈 American football, ⚾️ Baseball and more using the API created from flashscore.com
